duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and deploy a successful fulfillment strategy based on inventory, procurement, and customer-facing needs.
Coordinate communications and standards with Garden for Wildlife’s grower network.
Manage inventory and act as the inventory controller, including developing analysis of future inventory status based on sales and revenue projections.
Routinely monitor Shopify, Salesforce, and Garden for Wildlife’s fulfillment software to ensure all operations are running effectively.
Perform data analytics tasks in excel, to calculate various metrics related to inventory and fulfillment operations.
Responsible for data cleansing & revision, as well as developing various presentations based on data.

education_certification.credential: Two years of experience in an e-commerce inventory environment is required.
Familiarity with inventory management concepts as it relates to E-commerce organizations.
General familiarity with Microsoft Windows operating system, PDF’s, and other commonly used general programs.
